title: The One That Got Away: He Consoled Her After Her Dad's Passing, Now She Wants To Ask Him Out!
description:
She met a guy in the most awful circumstances but really want to ask him out. And if she doesn’t, she thinks he could be THE ONE THAT GOT AWAY!
